ClusterCore

Class FuzzyCMeans

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClusterCore.FuzzyCMeans

  • public class FuzzyCMeans
extends java.lang.Object
    Fuzzy-C-Means (FCM)

    Cluster analysis with Fuzzy-C-Means clustering algorithm 

     Step 1: Initialization
 Step 2: Determination of the cluster centers
 Step 3: Calculate the new partition matrix
 Step 4: Termination or repetition
 Step 5: optional - Repeat calculation (steps 2 to 4)
    Version:
    1.6.1 (2016-04-10)
    Author:
    Thomas Heym

      • determineClusterCenters

        public double[][] determineClusterCenters(boolean random,
                                          boolean returnPath)
        Returns the cluster centers
        Parameters:
        random - random initialization
        returnPath - Determines whether return the complete search path. Values: true, false
        Returns:
        Cluster centers and serarch path (optional); The cluster centers are at the end.
